templates.title: Jupyter Notebook Editor
templates.description: Standalone Jupyter 5.5.0 Notebook editor for Python 3.6
templates.note: Deploys Jupyter Notebook editor with Python 3.6.5, Tensorflow 1.11.0 and Keras enabled.

templates.title: SparkCluster 2.4.7 - Jupyter 5.4.0 - Python 2.7.16
templates.description: Spark 2.4.7 cluster with Jupyter 5.7.8 Notebook editor for Python 2.7
templates.note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.4.7 with Python 2.7.16, Tensorflow 2.1.0 and Keras enabled together with Jupyter 5.7.8 and PixieDust 1.1.19

templates.title: SparkCluster 2.4.7 - Zeppelin 0.10.0_snapshot - Python 3.7.10 - TF 2.4.1 - custom
templates.description: 40Gb worker stack with Spark 2.4.7 cluster with Zeppelin 0.10.0 (snapshot) with Python 3.7.10 and Tensorflow 2.4.1
templates.note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.4.7 with Python 3.7.10, Tensorflow 2.4.1 and Keras enabled together with Zeppelin 0.10.0 (snapshot) configured with Nokia CSL authentication.

templates.title: Small SparkCluster 2.4.7 - Zeppelin 0.10.0_snapshot - Python 3.7.10 - TF 2.4.1 - xpcore 1.1.4
templates.description: 40Gb per worker stack with Spark 2.4.7 cluster with Zeppelin 0.10.0 (snapshot) with Python 3.7.10 and Tensorflow 2.4.1
templates.note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.4.7 with Python 3.7.10, Tensorflow 2.4.1 and Keras enabled together with Zeppelin 0.10.0 (snapshot) configured with Nokia CSL authentication.

templates.title: SparkCluster 2.4.7 - Zeppelin 0.10.0_snapshot - Python 3.7.10 - TF 2.4.1 - xpcore 1.1.4
templates.description: 155Gb per worker Stack with Spark 2.4.7 cluster with Zeppelin 0.10.0 (snapshot) with Python 3.7.10 and Tensorflow 2.4.1
templates.note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.4.7 with Python 3.7.10, Tensorflow 2.4.1 tensorflow-probability 0.12.1 and Keras enabled together with Zeppelin 0.10.0 (snapshot) configured with Nokia CSL authentication.

templates.title: TEST SparkCluster 3.0.2 - Zeppelin 0.10.0_snapshot - Python 3.7.10 - TF 2.4.1 - xpcore 1.1.4
templates.description: STACK ONLY FOR TEST don't use it if you don't know why
templates.note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 3.0.2 with Python 3.7.10, Tensorflow 2.4.1 and Keras enabled together with Zeppelin 0.10.0 (snapshot) configured with Nokia CSL authentication.
